chunk:
Isntree Green Tea Fresh Toner

Brand: Isntree

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Camellia sinensis leaf extract, water, ginkgo biloba leaf extract, centella asiatica extract, salix alba (willow) bark extract, vaccinium angustifolium (blueberry) fruit extract, pinus palustris leaf extract, ulmus davidiana root extract, oenothera biennis (ev

enothera biennis (evening primrose) flower extract, pueraria lobata root extract, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer, allantoin, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, beta-glucan, disodium edta, hydroxyacetophenone.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developme
city; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
